'''Dr. Franzblau''' is [[Carol Willick|Carol's]] obstetrician in "[[The One With The Birth]]", portrayed by [[Jonathan Silverman]]. 

He flirts with [[Rachel Greene|Rachel]] and she takes a liking to him.   However after he makes a disparaging remark about coffee, she loses interest in him. He tells her about a trip to Paris that he had. And it seems that he despises female parts and is not so fond of his job.

He then helps Carol give birth and delivers [[Ben Geller|Ben]].
